q: Still, she said Michael Vick 's dogfighting operation probably helped pit bulls' bad rep because it showed that`` people can reintroduce these dogs back into a society that's not going to abuse them.'' The owner is responsible for what an animal does. It's totally your behavior, whether you have a good dog that minds well and is not a problem to society or you turn it into a vicious animal that will bite the mailman, the girl next door or grandma walking down the street, Michael Hansen said.
